definitions: of or having a special activity, purpose, or task; relating to the way in which something works or operates

examples.text: there are important functional differences between left and right brain

shortDefinitions: of or having special activity or purpose

definitions: (of a disease) affecting the operation, rather than the structure, of an organ
shortDefinitions: (of disease) affecting operation rather than structure of organ

definitions: (of a mental illness) having no discernible organic cause
shortDefinitions: (of mental illness) having no organic cause

definitions: designed to be practical and useful, rather than attractive

examples.text: she had assumed the apartment would be functional and simple
the museum will be fully functional from the opening of the festival

definitions: relating to a variable quantity whose value depends upon one or more other variables

examples.text: using functional notation, we can write—where L is the transactions demand for money

shortDefinitions: relating to variable quantity whose value depends on other variable
